performance_details.fx_impact: Negative impact of 140 basis points year-over-year

segments.name: iPhone

revenue.context: Down 1% year-over-year but grew on a constant currency basis

key_points: Faced a difficult compare with last year's $5 billion impact from COVID-related supply disruptions
Set June quarter records in the UK, Spain, Poland, Mexico, Indonesia, and the Philippines
Installed base reached a new all-time high across all geographic segments
iPhone models among the top-selling smartphones globally
High customer satisfaction with 98% in the U.S.
Strong affinity for Apple among customers globally

iphone_15: Gorgeous new design with color-infused back glass and contoured edges
iOS 18 enhancements including Photos app redesign, home screen customization, messages over satellite, and Apple Intelligence integration
iphone_15_pro: Most advanced camera system with equivalent of seven pro lenses
Features like Emergency SoS and roadside assistance via satellite

segments.name: Services
key_points: Set an all-time revenue record in Services
Achieved all-time revenue records across advertising, cloud services, payment services, and video
December quarter records in App Store and AppleCare
Paid subscriptions climbed to an all-time high
Installed base surpassed 2.2 billion active devices
Double-digit growth represents an acceleration from the September quarter

highlights: New iPhone app enhancing the live sports experience
Real-time scores, stats, and more for fans
Perfect companion for MLS Season Pass subscribers

features: Writing tools to help express oneself
Image playground for creating fun images and new communication methods
Tools for summarizing and prioritizing notifications
Integration of ChatGPT into iPhone, Mac, and iPad experiences

segments.name: Mac
key_points: Driven by the strength of the new 13-inch and 15-inch MacBook Air models
Celebrated Mac's 40th anniversary
Introduction of M3, M3 Pro, and M3 Max chips
Launch of the latest generation of Apple silicon
Installed base reached an all-time high with nearly half of Mac buyers being new to the product
High customer satisfaction with 96% in the U.S.

new_products.macbook_air: World's most popular laptop, best consumer laptop for AI with M3 chip and advanced Neural Engine
new_products.macbook_pro: World's best pro notebook family with M3 chips
new_products.imac: iMac powered by M3 chips, faster and more capable

segments.name: iPad
key_points: Revenue increased by 24% year-over-year due to the launch of the new iPad Pro and iPad Air
Unveiled the all-new 11 and 13 inch iPad Air
Introduced the new iPad Pro with M4 chip for enhanced AI capabilities
iPad empowers video editors, music makers, and creatives with cutting-edge AI features in Final Cut Pro and Logic Pro
Installed base at an all-time high with over half of customers being new to the product
High customer satisfaction with 97% in the U.S.

ipad_air: Perfect for education, entertainment, and more
ipad_pro: Enhanced AI capabilities with Apple Intelligence integration

segments.name: Wearables, Home and Accessories

revenue.context: Down 2% year-over-year, sequential acceleration from Q2

key_points: Revenue decreased by 2% year-over-year due to challenging launch comparisons
Apple Watch helps users on wellness journeys with new navigation capabilities in watchOS 10
Leveraging AI and machine learning for lifesaving features like regular rhythm notifications and fall detection
Nearly two-thirds of Apple Watch purchasers were new to the product
High customer satisfaction with 97% in the U.S.
AirPods lineup remains a holiday favorite

apple_watch: Empowering users to live a healthier day
AI-powered lifesaving features like regular rhythm notifications and fall detection
airpods: Continues to be a holiday favorite

services_gross_margin.context: Up 190 basis points from last quarter

expectations.revenue: Similar to last year's March quarter, adjusting for one less week and removing COVID-related factory shutdown impacts
expectations.foreign_exchange: Negative impact of about 1.5 percentage points year-over-year

apple_intelligence.description: Builds on years of innovation and investment in AI and Machine Learning, transforming user interactions with technology
features: Writing tools to help express oneself
Image playground for creating fun images and new communication methods
Powerful tools for summarizing and prioritizing notifications
Integration of ChatGPT into iPhone, Mac, and iPad experiences

vision_pro.description: Remarkable capabilities with over 2,500 native spatial apps and 1.5 million compatible apps for Vision OS
use_cases: Exploring entire worlds with finger gestures
Enterprise use cases like aircraft engine maintenance training at KLM Airlines, real-time team collaboration for racing at Porsche, and immersive kitchen design at Lowe's

software_updates: Worldwide Developers Conference scheduled for next month

store_updates: Opened latest flagship store in Shanghai
Demoing Apple Vision Pro for customers
Continued expansion during the holidays to assist customers with holiday shopping

key_programs: Partnerships with suppliers to bring more clean energy online for Apple production
Goal to become 100% carbon-neutral across all products by 2030
Committed $200 million to nature-based carbon removal projects through the Restore Fund
Welcomed two supplier partners as new investors, investing up to an additional $80 million in the Restore Fund

metadata.installed_base: Over 2.2 billion active devices across all products and geographic segments

challenges: Challenging year-over-year comparisons due to one less week and COVID-related factory shutdowns
